Jeremy Scahill - read this

By Krister Axel on 11/21 2008 at 01_13 in Historical

Jeremy Scahill is one of the smartest and most on-point and factual political commentators that I have heard in a long time. He is amazing in terms of his ability to cite sources and names, and he is a great writer. He gives me hope for our generation. Here is a very sobering assessment of the upcoming Obama administration:

link

http://www.alternet.org/audits/107666/this_is_change_20_hawks%2C_clinton...
